item.description:
**UPDATED**Meeting location: Town Park and Ride Lot-- next to Blue Gate Gardens and the Town Transfer Station on Upper Main Street (Rte. 127). The driveway for the town lot is immediately before Blue Gate Gardens, stay to the right after turning into the drive.
Date: Sunday, May 18, 2008
Time: 1p.m.
**Parking is free.
Join us this month as we set out to photograph lighthouses around Cape Ann. (by land)

The lighthouses we plan to photograph:

Thacher Island Twin Lights
Straitsmouth Island Light
Annisquam Light
Eastern Point Light
Ten Pound Island Light

Maps of our route will be handed out before we depart the town lot. Rain or shine, we hope to make it to all the lighthouses. Comfortable weatherproof clothes are recommended, as well as shoes that can be worn in the sand.

Please Note: Parking can be extremely limited on Cape Ann, so it would be best if we try to carpool from the town lot. A couple of shoot locations do not have parking available so our stops will need to be brief, but the view will be great!

This promises to be a great event, looking forward to seeing you all on Sunday!
item.why: CAPE Group members are friendly, helpful, and engaging, not to mention a lot of fun! We have a mixture of photography experience, from novice to professional.
item.name: Cape Ann Lighthouses
